00157 /* The server's mount list (we use the native mount v3 structure) */
00158 mountlist MNT_List_head = NULL;
00159 mountlist MNT_List_tail = NULL;
00160 
00173 int nfs_Add_MountList_Entry( char * hostname, char * dirpath )
00174 {
00175   mountlist pnew_mnt_list_entry ;
00176 
00177   /* Sanity check */
00178   if( hostname == NULL || dirpath == NULL )
00179     return 0 ;
00180 
00181 #ifndef _NO_MOUNT_LIST  
00182     
00183 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00184   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00185   BuddySetDebugLabel( "struct mountbody" ) ;
00186 #endif 
00187   /* Allocate the new entry */
00188   if( ( pnew_mnt_list_entry = (mountlist)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( struct mountbody ) ) ) == NULL )
00189     return 0 ;
00190 
00191 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00192   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00193   BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00194 #endif 
00195   
00196   memset( pnew_mnt_list_entry , 0,  sizeof( struct mountbody ) );
00197 
00198 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00199   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00200   BuddySetDebugLabel( "ml_hostname" ) ;
00201 #endif 
00202   if( (  pnew_mnt_list_entry->ml_hostname = (char *)Mem_Alloc( MAXHOSTNAMELEN ) ) == NULL )
00203     {
00204       Mem_Free( pnew_mnt_list_entry ) ;
00205       return 0 ;
00206     }
00207   memset( pnew_mnt_list_entry->ml_hostname , 0,  MAXHOSTNAMELEN );
00208   
00209 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00210   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00211   BuddySetDebugLabel( "ml_directory" ) ;
00212 #endif 
00213   if( (  pnew_mnt_list_entry->ml_directory = (char *)Mem_Alloc( MAXPATHLEN ) ) == NULL )
00214     {
00215       Mem_Free( pnew_mnt_list_entry->ml_hostname ) ;
00216       Mem_Free( pnew_mnt_list_entry ) ;
00217       return 0 ;
00218     }
00219   memset( pnew_mnt_list_entry->ml_directory , 0,  MAXPATHLEN );    
00220     
00221 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00222   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00223   BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00224 #endif 
00225 
00226 
00227   /* Copy the data */
00228   strncpy( pnew_mnt_list_entry->ml_hostname, hostname, MAXHOSTNAMELEN ) ;
00229   strncpy( pnew_mnt_list_entry->ml_directory, dirpath, MAXPATHLEN ) ;
00230   
00231   /* initialize next pointer */
00232   pnew_mnt_list_entry->ml_next = NULL;
00233       
00234   /* This should occur only for the first mount */
00235   if( MNT_List_head == NULL )
00236     {
00237       MNT_List_head = pnew_mnt_list_entry ;
00238     }
00239   
00240   
00241   /* Append to the tail of the list */
00242   if( MNT_List_tail == NULL )
00243     MNT_List_tail = pnew_mnt_list_entry ;
00244   else
00245     {
00246       MNT_List_tail->ml_next = pnew_mnt_list_entry ;
00247       MNT_List_tail =  pnew_mnt_list_entry ;
00248     }
00249   
00250   
00251 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFSPROTO
00252   nfs_Print_MountList() ;
00253 #endif
00254 
00255 #ifdef _DETECT_MEMCORRUPT
00256   if (!BuddyCheck( MNT_List_head ) || !BuddyCheck( MNT_List_tail ))
00257   {
00258     fprintf( stderr, "Memory corruption in nfs_Add_MountList_Entry. Head = %p, Tail = %p.\n",
00259         MNT_List_head, MNT_List_tail );
00260   }
00261   if (!BuddyCheck( pnew_mnt_list_entry->ml_hostname ) || !BuddyCheck( pnew_mnt_list_entry->ml_directory ))
00262   {
00263     fprintf( stderr, "Memory corruption in nfs_Add_MountList_Entry. Hostname = %p, Directory = %p.\n",
00264         pnew_mnt_list_entry->ml_hostname, pnew_mnt_list_entry->ml_directory );
00265   }
00266 #endif  
00267     
00268 #endif  
00269   
00270   return 1;
00271 } /* nfs_Add_MountList_Entry */
00272 
00273 
00286 int nfs_Remove_MountList_Entry( char * hostname, char * dirpath )
00287 {
00288    char buff[256];
00289   
00290    mountlist piter_mnt_list_entry ;
00291    mountlist piter_mnt_list_entry_prev ;
00292    int found = 0 ;
00293    
00294    if( hostname == NULL ) 
00295      return 0 ;
00296    
00297 #ifndef _NO_MOUNT_LIST  
00298    
00299    piter_mnt_list_entry_prev = NULL;   
00300    
00301    for( piter_mnt_list_entry = MNT_List_head;  
00302         piter_mnt_list_entry != NULL ;
00303         piter_mnt_list_entry = piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_next )
00304      {
00305        
00306 #    ifdef _DETECT_MEMCORRUPT
00307       if (!BuddyCheck( piter_mnt_list_entry )
00308           || !BuddyCheck( piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_hostname )
00309           || !BuddyCheck( piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_directory ))
00310       {
00311         fprintf( stderr, "Memory corruption in nfs_Remove_MountList_Entry. Current = %p, Head = %p, Tail = %p.\n",
00312             piter_mnt_list_entry, MNT_List_head, MNT_List_tail );
00313       }       
00314 #    endif  
00315        
00316        /* BUGAZOMEU: pas de verif sur le path */
00317        if( !strncmp( piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_hostname, hostname, MAXHOSTNAMELEN )
00318            /*  && !strncmp( piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_directory, dirpath, MAXPATHLEN ) */ )
00319          {
00320            found = 1 ;
00321            break ;
00322          }
00323          
00324        piter_mnt_list_entry_prev = piter_mnt_list_entry ;
00325        
00326      }
00327 
00328    if( found )
00329      {
00330        /* remove head item ? */
00331        if ( piter_mnt_list_entry_prev == NULL )
00332          MNT_List_head =  MNT_List_head->ml_next ;         
00333        else
00334          piter_mnt_list_entry_prev->ml_next = piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_next ;
00335        
00336        /* remove tail item ? */
00337        if ( MNT_List_tail == piter_mnt_list_entry )
00338          MNT_List_tail = piter_mnt_list_entry_prev ;
00339          
00340        Mem_Free( piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_hostname ) ;
00341        Mem_Free( piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_directory ) ;
00342        Mem_Free( piter_mnt_list_entry ) ;
00343        
00344      }
00345 
00346 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFSPROTO
00347    nfs_Print_MountList() ;
00348 #endif
00349 
00350 #endif
00351    
00352   return 1;
00353 } /* nfs_Remove_MountList_Entry */
00354 
00355 
00367 int nfs_Purge_MountList( void )
00368 {
00369    mountlist piter_mnt_list_entry, piter_mnt_list_entry_next  ;
00370    
00371    piter_mnt_list_entry      = MNT_List_head ;
00372    piter_mnt_list_entry_next = MNT_List_head ;
00373 
00374 #ifndef _NO_MOUNT_LIST   
00375       
00376    while( piter_mnt_list_entry_next != NULL )
00377    {
00378      piter_mnt_list_entry_next = piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_next ;
00379      Mem_Free( piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_hostname ) ;
00380      Mem_Free( piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_directory ) ;
00381      Mem_Free( piter_mnt_list_entry ) ;
00382      piter_mnt_list_entry = piter_mnt_list_entry_next ;
00383    }
00384    
00385    MNT_List_head = NULL ;
00386    MNT_List_tail = NULL ;
00387    
00388 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFSPROTO
00389    nfs_Print_MountList() ;
00390 #endif
00391    
00392 #endif
00393      
00394   return 1;
00395 } /* nfs_Purge_MountList */
00396 
00397 
00409 int nfs_Init_MountList( void )
00410 {
00411   MNT_List_head = NULL ;
00412   MNT_List_tail = NULL ;
00413 
00414 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFSPROTO
00415   nfs_Print_MountList() ;
00416 #endif
00417 
00418   return 1;
00419 } /* nfs_Init_MountList */
00420 
00421 
00433 mountlist nfs_Get_MountList( void )
00434 {
00435 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFSPROTO 
00436   nfs_Print_MountList() ;
00437 #endif
00438 
00439   return MNT_List_head ;
00440 } /* nfs_Get_MountList */
00441 
00453 void nfs_Print_MountList( void )
00454 {
00455   mountlist piter_mnt_list_entry = NULL ;
00456   
00457   if( MNT_List_head == NULL )
00458     DisplayLog( "Mount List Entry is empty" ) ;
00459   
00460   for( piter_mnt_list_entry = MNT_List_head;  
00461         piter_mnt_list_entry != NULL ;
00462         piter_mnt_list_entry = piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_next )
00463     DisplayLog( "Mount List Entry : ml_hostname=%s   ml_directory=%s", 
00464             piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_hostname, piter_mnt_list_entry->ml_directory ) ;
00465   
00466     return  ;
00467 } /* nfs_Print_MountList */
